newsitem.title: USA: PRESS DIGEST - New York Times front page - Sept 3.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - New York Times front page - Sept 3.

text.p: The New York Times reported the following stories on its front page on Tuesday:
* United States to act against the Iraqis for raid on Kurds.
* Leading in campaign, President Clinton plays the underdog.
* Republican presidential candidate Dole hammers home message he wants to cut taxes.
* Injured Yankee baseball pitcher David Cone makes sensational comeback - no hits or runs in seven innings.
* Bell Atlantic has faced problems starting a local telephone service in Mexico.
* Seminarian held in bomb charges at Florida airport.
* New York agency had noted problems in home where mother starved four-year-old girl to death.
